verses.text: Ach in Diosal, tanhvej in val, anhej t'ayach tzin col in b'a.
Mamin Jehov치, swal t'ayach to Vajal ach. Masanil wach'il ay t'ayin, a t'ayach scoti.
Te wach' yic eb' tzach k'anab'ajan t'a skal eb' a chonhab'. In gana tzin aj t'a skal eb'.
Ol te q'uib'chaanh syaelal eb' sb'atcan t'a spatic junok comon dios. Max vak'ochlaj in b'a vak'an schiq'uil nok' silab' yet' eb' t'a scomon dios chi'. Max val-laj in b'ha t'a sdiosal eb' chi'.
Mamin Jehov치, anhej t'ayach svik' masanil wach'il. Ha achton tzak' masanil tas snib'ej in k'ool. D'a yol a k'ab' ayek' in q'uinal.
Ha val b'aj ix echtejcan in macb'en, yelxo te wach'. Manhxo jantacoc swach'il tas ix ak'kan chi' t'ayin.
Mamin Jehov치, swal wach' lolonel t'ayach yujto a ach tzak' in raz칩n, tza k'ayb'an pax in pensar t'ak'walil.
Masanil tiempo naan achnhej vuuj. Yujto ayachnhej ek' ved'oc, yuj chi' malaj tas tzin ik'ani.
Yuj chi' ste tzalaj in k'ool tzin b'itani. Malaj tas tzin na'a, yujto tzach vak'och yipoc in k'ool.
Manh ol in actejcanlaj t'a skal eb' chamnac, manh ol a cha k'ab'at in nivanil tik, a in k'anab'ajum in tik t'ayach.
Tzak' vojtaquejel sb'eal q'uinal, tzak'an tzalajb'oc in k'ool ayic ayinek' ed'oc. Aynhej tzalajk'olal t'a a tz'ey t'a masanil q'uinal.
